text: Epeiroides is a genus of orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Epeiroides bahiensis. It was first described by Eugen von Keyserling in 1885, and has only been found in Costa Rica and Brazil. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Central America Category:Spiders of South America Category:Taxa named by Eugen von Keyserling
title: Epeiroides
